sub_title: Step up your sales, customer service, forecast, inventory, demand planning and S&OP process with operational excellence.
summary:
I'm specialized in sales, customer service, order to cash process and can combine this perfectly with an annual business planning, annual sales budgeting (volume, turnover, margin), pricing, new product introductions, 15 month rolling forecasting planning, order flow, demand management, inventory planning, shipment arrangements and market share overviews.

Working with me means data driven sales decisions and data driven production planning.
My work processes will bring calmness in your organization. Your customers/distributors/resellers will get the right products at the requested moment. Your production will get clear overviews what to produce at which moment.

My dashboard will provide data transparency for all involved parties. Management will get grip on performance of each division. Company will perform much better due to data transparency for each division.

Your employees will be trained to scale up their knowledge and reach the level of go-to person for their role inside the company. Lean operation processes according to the first time right principles and operational excellence in execution are trademarks that will bring the required success for your organization.

Invite me, to scale up your organization. It will create more sales volume, turnover, better performing departments, less inventory and many cost savings.

My methods, templates and knowledge has proven it's success and can be implemented immediately without losing valuable time.

-------

It is knowledge, experience and proven implementations that orchestrates all these departments towards a customer centric operation with fulfilment of the company objective in the sense of sales volume, turnover and margin contribution. First time right implementations and operational excellence for each department is the key in succeeding the agreed annual budget. It starts with the right conductor whom orchestrates all these departments towards achieving high performance. See also link: 
(Europe) -->https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7EYAUazLI9k
(Asia) -->https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u8z2nFHX6qw

The reason why I have selected these two movies are, that the idea comes from one person whom is guiding other departments towards an optimum cooperation. After that, the business starts to evolve, grow and all departments are following each other in harmony. The customers on the side line are noticing the harmony inside the company and recognise the solid company structure. From this moment product leadership, operational excellence and customers intimacy will become the base for customer conversations.

treasury_media.title: Orchestrating all departments towards operational excellence.jpg
treasury_media.description:
I'm specialized in sales, customer service, order to cash process and can combine this perfectly with an annual business planning, annual sales budgeting, pricing, new product introductions, 15 month rolling forecast planning, demand management, inventory planning, shipment arrangements and market share overviews.

Working with me means data driven sales decisions and data driven production planning.
Your customers/distributors/resellers will get the right product at the requested moment.

profile_positions.description: Communicating with customers about their thermal spray coating requirement. Creating quotes that meet their coating challenge with consideration of technical feasibility in terms of milling, lathe solutions, required coating application and grinding to the final required tolerances.
profile_positions.title: Sales / Order Engineer

profile_positions.description: Organizing exhibitions in China, Germany and USA. Maintaining contact with local agents, exhibition management, booth builders and various suppliers regarding sales brochures, printing companies, marketing material, invitations, etc. Budget reporting to the management team, taking care of presentation material and providing cost of ownership calculations in excel, for the CEO. Successfully finding, approaching, captivating and connecting new customers/markets in Europe, for a newly developed photo-graphic printing machine in decoration technology. See also: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cICGh_Oon6Q
profile_positions.title: Teamlead Sales Support & Marketing

profile_positions.description: Establishing a new department that knows how to convert the business strategy into an operational plan, which is supported by new processes, procedures and working methods. Provides direction to the management team in the field of customers/distributors, sales divisions, customer service, product management (introductions), purchasing, supply chain, production planning and shipments. Responsible for the annual sales business planning (volume, turnover, margin, budget creation, target market share), sales article master, pricing (gross price, discount structures, cost pricing and margin determination), monthly sales budget (preparation, implementation and execution) , 15 months rolling forecast and demand planning/management (implementation and execution), guide order to cash process, stock determination on vessels/ports/arrived/ready for shipment/aging, follow-up demand planning management (capacity vs. order receipt), factory shipments, month-end closure check, flash reports and reporting to headquarter in Japan. As chairman of the monthly sales and production meeting, I gave insight in budgets, performance and results for all these fields to the CEO and the factory director, the audience in the room where general managers, managers and department supervisors. Also note taker and follow-up person for the agreed action points. Consultant for the CEO and contact person to sales, product management, engineering, production planning and the financial department. See also: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_LBaivkJcJs
profile_positions.title: Manager Planning & Market Research

profile_positions.description: Expansion of the customer service department in the Netherlands, by transferring customer service activities from the Czech branch to the Netherlands. Guiding the 4 colleagues on the automotive department, with follow-up and reconciliation of problematic orders and overdue payments. Contact partner for customers in case of escalation situations. Contact person for the management team in Germany, for guidance and implementation of sales developments, delivery reliability and improvement actions. Also see: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gQk0F3h7vTM
profile_positions.title: Teamlead Customer Service Automotive

profile_positions.description: Selling Hydrocarbon- and Chemical solvents to customers in Turkey and Israel. In addition, taking care of the entire order to cash process, purchasing from Rotterdam by means of supply through sea vessels, tank containers and IBC’s in container, to storage locations in Istanbul area. Contact with the local customs clearance partner, actions at local storage terminals, logistics partners and customers. In addition, responsible for the SAP software implementation, to realize correctly and timely record of all transactions in SAP. See also: https://videos.emerson.com/detail/videos/highlighted/video/6083370121001/emerson-and-poliport-partnership?autoStart=true
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Coördinator for TR & IL

profile_positions.description: Forecast, quote, negotiate, confirm and deliver Hydrocarbon- and Chemical Solvents in bulk truck loads to customers in Germany. Also responsible for sales turnover and margin for these customers group. See also:  https://www.shell.com/business-customers/chemicals/our-products
profile_positions.title: Account Coordinator for Germany

profile_positions.description: Ensuring that purchasing, storage in 3rd party warehouse, inventory, EMENA sales and distribution of ice cube machines and bins are properly organized. Furthermore guiding the three colleagues on the department, export customers (Letter of Credit), contact with branch offices and solve damage cases during logistics. See also: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TmHysgTUGCA&feature=emb_title
profile_positions.title: Manager Sales Administration

profile_positions.description: Setup and expand the EMEAR sales office department, with the associated order to cash process and letter of credit handling. Contact with dealers, distributors, branch offices and agents with regards to price lists, discounts, options, special customer requirements and new product introductions. Coordinate customer requirements between sales, product management, engineering, production and logistics, in order to secure the monthly, quarterly and annual budgets. Department expanded to five new colleagues and centralized sales administration. See also:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pyj_dERTDfo
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager Sales Administration

profile_positions.description: Managing the entire Truck and Trailer department. In concrete terms, this meant that new and existing stocks had to be built up in line with the market requirements and mailing campaigns should be launched. Contact suppliers with regards to purchasing volume, price and quality. Maintain relationships with customers and solve logistics delivery delays and problems. Furthermore, keeping an eye on market movements and create new price lists. Company is sold to Sator-LKQ in 2013.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager Truck and Trailer Dept.

profile_positions.description: Handling warranty settlements administratively. Contact person to the factory in France with regards to new legislation in exhaust emissions from combustion engines and subsidy schemes of the Dutch government. Consult with factory to dissolve technical complicated problems. Follow training courses at the factory and provide internal training on subjects like Diesel Particular Filter (DPF-II) and System of Active Stability for forklifts. Company was bought by BT in 2007.
profile_positions.title: Technical Assistant forklifts
